https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.name: description

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/epoch.name: epoch

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/generat._instruction: Add the device used to generate this stimulus.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/generat.label: Generated by
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/generat.name: generatedBy

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this stimulus that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this stimulus.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this stimulus that may help you to find this instance more easily.

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specifi._instruction: Add the specification information for this stimulus.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specifi.description: Detailed and precise presentation of, or proposal for something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specifi.label: Specification
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specifi.name: specification

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type._instruction: Add the type that describe this electrical stimulus.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.label: Type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.name: type
